                                  java.lang.String message)

userRegistrationFields

boolean userRegistrationFields(java.lang.String IDUser,
                               java.lang.String[] fields)
This method is called from the ThreadManager when a new user is logged in. It is called always after to call newUserRegistered(String IDUser) and before to call userSessionFields(String IDUser, Object[] fields).

Parameters:
IDUser - the ID Bluetooth of the user
fields - the String array containing the fields of the registration
Returns:
true if method correctly elaborate the operations, false otherwise.
See Also:
newUserRegistered(String IDUser)

onClosing

boolean onClosing()
This method is called from ThreadManager before to close tha application, (request from Server or request from application by using requestForClosing )

Returns:
true if method correctly elaborate the operations, false otherwise.
See Also:
com.jsoft.linkbuild.listenerAndServerLibrary.ThreadManager.java#requestForClosing(int password)

userSessionFields

boolean userSessionFields(java.lang.String IDUser,
                          java.lang.Object[] fields)
This method is called from ThreadManager when a session for an application's user was rescued. It is called always after to call newUserRegistered(String IDUser) and after to call userRegistrationFields(String IDUser, String[] fields)

Parameters:
IDUser - the ID Bluetooth of the user
fields - the array of Object that contains the fields represent the session
Returns:
true if method correctly elaborate the operations, false otherwise.
